article: Everyone in the neighborhood knew who Ugly was, the tomcat. He had only one eye and _ the other should have been was a hole. He was also missing his ear on the same _ , His left foot appeared to have been badly broken at one time, _ , and his tail has long been lost. Every time someone saw Ugly there was the same _ ."That's one ugly cat !" All the children were _ not to touch him, but whenever he caught sight of children, he would come running, meowing and bump his head against their hand _ for their love. If you ever picked him up he would immediately begin sucking on your shirt, earring,... _ he could find. One day Ugly tried to _ his love with the neighbour's dogs. They did not respond _ , and Ugly was badly bitten. From my apartment I heard his scream and _ to his aid. By the time I got to where he was lying, it was _ that Ugly's sad life was almost at an end. As I picked up the poor eat and tried to carry him home, I could feel him struggling. Then I _ a familiar suck on my ear. Even in the greatest pain, that ugly battle scarred cat was asking only for a little _ .At that moment I thought Ugly was the most beautiful, loving creature I had ever seen. Never once did he try to bite or scratch me, or _ try to get away from me. Ugly just looked up at me completely trusting me to _ his pain. Ugly died in my arms _ Icould get inside, but I held him for a long time. Ugly _ me a lot about loving and giving. He had been scarred on the outside, but I was scarred on the _ ,and it was time for me to learn to love truly and give my total to those I cared for.
